termsAndConditions.mainBody:
As a financial aid recipient, I agree to the following: 

~To immediately report to the Financial Aid and Scholarships Office the receipt of funds or support from all other sources such as awards from outside agencies, grants, scholarships, fellowships, department awards, tuition/fee waivers, etc. Outside resources can be reported in the My Finances section of Cal Central.

~To immediately report to the Financial Aid and Scholarships Office any changes in my enrollment or expected graduation date.

~I understand that financial aid awards are subject to revision should there be changes in my financial aid eligibility and are subject to the availability of funds.

~In accepting a scholarship, I give UC Berkeley permission to release my academic, financial and biographical information, as required by the scholarship donor, to enforce the terms and conditions of the scholarship.

~I understand that information regarding my financial aid and financial transactions will be communicated and conducted electronically.

~To read all messages and information regarding my financial aid.

~I understand that my budget and my grant or scholarships, if applicable, are determined by my housing status. I understand that if the University cannot verify my status, I will be required to provide proof of my living arrangements and my budget and aid offer will be adjusted accordingly.

~I understand that it is my responsibility to understand eligibility requirements, including the Satisfactory Academic Progress (SAP) policy. I understand I must meet the SAP requirements as defined on the Financial Aid and Scholarships Office website to receive financial aid: http://financialaid.berkeley.edu/satisfactory-academic-progress

~To repay any funds I receive which cannot be reasonably attributed to meeting my educational expenses for the current academic year at UC Berkeley and the amount of any repayment is based on regulations published by the Secretary of Education.

~I may be subject to a fine up to ten thousand dollars, imprisonment for up to five years, or both if I give false or misleading information.
termsAndConditions.dynamicHeader: You have not reviewed and agreed to the Terms and Conditions of your financial aid for the 2018-2019 academic year.
termsAndConditions.dynamicBody: If you do not wish to agree, use the Go Back to My Finances to continue viewing your information. Your aid will not disburse until you have accepted the Terms and Conditions.
